quiz.text:

quiz.text:
Recently (Dec 2022), All India Institute of Ayurveda (AIIA) has signed an MoU with which

of the following international institutions to promote futuristic Ayurveda by bringing a synergy between traditional wisdom and modern tools and technology?

quiz.text: Recently (Dec 2022), an MoU has been signed between Ministry of Federal Affairs and General Administration (Nepal) and Indian Embassy in Kathmandu (Nepal) for the implementation of three High-Impact Development Projects (HICDPs) in Nepal. Which of the following is/are the areas in which three High-Impact Development Projects are being implementedt?

Electrification of all Houses
Affordable Housing
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
